original_text: And the people believed: and when they heard that the Lord had visited the children of Israel, and that he had looked upon their affliction, then they bowed their heads and worshipped.
korean_text: 백성이 믿으며 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손을 찾으시고 그들의 고난을 살피셨다 함을 듣고 머리 숙여 경배하였더라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had visited the children of Israel
and that he had looked upon their affliction
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 그들의 고통을 살펴보셨다는 것을
